panels.description: Pending transactions.
panels.title: Orderpool txs

panels.description: Gas spent simulating bundles on top of the block.
panels.title: Simulation gas

panels.description: Pending bundles and share bundles.
panels.title: Orderpool bundles

panels.description: Simulated orders on top of block as first step of block building.
panels.title: Simulation OK orders

panels.description:
Counts payloads when builder started jobs for block building. 
* There are 50 slots per 10 mins but we have to account for mev-boost adoption. 
* There are more than 1 payload job per slot when slot is suspected to be missed.
panels.title: Active Slots (10 min)

panels.description: Count of the errors returned from the flashbots/block-processor.
panels.title: Blocks API Errors

panels.description:
* When submitting to the relay counts simulation errors returned by the relay (available only in non-optimistic mode).
* When running in dry-run counts simulation errors received directly from the simulation node.
panels.title: Blocks Simulation Errors

panels.description: Count of relay submissions that were initiated by the builder.
panels.title: Initiated relay submissions (10 min)

panels.description:
Errors returned from the mev boost relay:
* conn          - errors related to connection, e.g. tcp connection interruption.
* too_many  - too many request error. rate limit of submissions was hit.
* other         - unclassified errors.
panels.title: Relay Errors (10 min)

panels.description: Counts submissions that were accepted by the relay.
panels.title: Relay Accepted Submissions (10 min)

panels.description:
For all blocks that are ready for submission to the relay its = minimum_{over included orders} (submission start - order received)

This metric still is kind of flawed:
* if we have gaps in orderflow they go towards increasing this value 
* if some orders are slow to process we will not see them in the built block
* merging builder does not take new orders into account as fast as possible

but its still captures the whole journey of the order through the builder including some places that we don't measure with "fill time" and "finalize time"
panels.title: Min E2E included order latency inside builder (ms)

panels.description: Time spent filling block with transactions.
panels.title: Fill Time (ms)

panels.description: Time spent finalizing blocks in milliseconds. Its mostly spent calculating state root hash of the block.
panels.title: Finalize Time (ms)

panels.description: Number of txs in the built blocks.
panels.title: Block built txs

panels.description: Time spent calculating root hash of the final block.
panels.title: Root Hash Time (ms)

panels.description: Gas used in built blocks
panels.title: Block gas used

panels.description: gas used in simulations (including failing bundles) / time spent building block
panels.title: Block build sim MGas/s

panels.description: Time between starting a bid request to the relay and getting a return. It counts time that relay spent validating block in non-optimistic mode. Usually it can be assumed that this is the time between initiating request and bid being available to the proposer.
panels.title: Relay Submit Time (ms) [q = 0.5]

panels.description: Gas used while building blocks. Includes gas used for failed bundles.
panels.title: Block built simulation gas used

panels.description:
Time spent validation block.
Block is validated:
* if dry-run mode is on
* if optimistic_prevalidate_optimistic_blocks = true and block is optimistic
panels.title: Validation Time (ms)

panels.description: Time between starting a bid request to the relay and getting a return. It counts time that relay spent validating block in non-optimistic mode. Usually it can be assumed that this is the time between initiating request and bid being available to the proposer.
panels.title: Relay Submit Time (ms) [q = 0.9]

panels.description: Count of blocks for which bid > true value
panels.title: Subsidized block count

panels.description: (bid -  true value) for blocks for which bid > true value
panels.title: Subsidy value
Total spent ETH on subsidies per hour
